column5: consumer confidence fallsUS STOCKS-Wall St near flat though retail shares rallyUPDATE 4-Home Depot sees post-winter repairs boosting spring salesHome Depot sees post-winter repairs boosting spring salesUS STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  US STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's  fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials. |US STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct VideoUS STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  US STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct   Home Depot sees post-winter repairs boosting spring salesUS STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  US STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's  fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials. |US STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct VideoUS STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  US STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      "We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct  By Dhanya Skariachan     Feb 25 Winter storms and record cold in much of the United States hurt Home Depot's fourth quarter sales of everything from lumber to building materials.     But the world's largest home improvement chain expects to benefit this spring when Americans begin to repair snow damaged homes and gardens.      We know firsthand that many homeowners have some major repairs ahead of them which suggest we should have a great spring selling season

ICE,ICE delists Singapore's SMX contracts, plans relaunch SINGAPORE, Feb 25 IntercontinentalExchange Group  said on Tuesday it has cancelled all contracts listed on the Singapore Mercantile Exchange (SMX), a bourse it earlier acquired for $150 million and expects to relaunch later in 2014.

column2: Lilly weekly diabetes drug succeeds vs market leader Victoza -studyUPDATE 1-Lilly weekly diabetes drug as effective as market leader Victoza-study Feb 25 An experimental once-weekly medicine for type 2 diabetes developed by Eli Lilly and Co proved as effective in lowering blood sugar as Victoza from Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk in an eagerly anticipated late stage study. column203: Nasdaq off 0.1 pctUS STOCKS-Wall St dips on day after S&P; 500 hits record high * Dow off 0.2 pct; S&P; 500 off 0.1 pct; Nasdaq off 0.1 pct    By Phil Wahba     Feb 25 Macy's Inc's sales this year were weak until Valentine's Day
column204: the department store operator said on Tuesday
